name: web-journey-recorder-pro
description: Chrome Extension for recording user journeys with Gemini AI

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && esbuild src/index.tsx src/content-script.js options.js --bundle --outdir=dist --format=esm --loader:.tsx=tsx --loader:.js=js --minify --entry-names=[name] --allow-overwrite && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['manifest.json', 'index.html', 'options.html', 'index.css', 'src/service-worker.js'].forEach(f => fs.copyFileSync(f, 'dist/' + f.split('/').pop()));" && mkdir -p dist/lib && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.readdirSync('src/lib').forEach(f => fs.copyFileSync('src/lib/' + f, 'dist/lib/' + f));"
